## ColorUtils.hasAlphaInHex() function

Determines if number encoded color contains alpha (opacity) defined and different then 255.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function hasAlphaInHex(hex: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  hex | number | The number encoded color (0xRRGGBB or 0xTTRRGGBB in hex). |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if color has transparency defined.
